chat_layout.send_controls: ask/do work toggles with send button under the message box
chat_layout.review_column: task feed over staged changes on the right

dataset_buckets.bucket_store: BucketStore writes append-only versions + diffs under .codex_local_agent/memory/buckets.
dataset_buckets.dataset_tags: Each OCR row stores bucket_id, sha256 hashes, and sanitized tags for offline RAG.
dataset_buckets.dual_ocr: Fast + full OCR text are persisted per image turn per Required-Updates §2.

mini_app_dock.labeled_buttons: Dock buttons display full names and highlight when active.
mini_app_dock.arrow_handle: A blue-bordered handle expands or collapses the left dock without losing panel state.
mini_app_dock.auto_collapse: When no mini-apps remain active the dock width drops to zero to return workspace space.

script_creator.desktop_shortcut: Desktop shortcut builds the project folder under the user Desktop using the provided name.
script_creator.bootstrap_assets: New projects receive .codex_local_agent/ with agent.yaml, agent.md, dataset/log/memory scaffolding.
script_creator.overwrite_guard: Existing files prompt with a high-contrast preview before overwrite and respect user cancellation.
